title: OCS Teams Split 1
body:
Hey friends!

I'd love to see if there's any information on which teams/players are competing in the OCS for the first split of season 6. If the info is not out yet when could we expect to see it (roughly)?

replies.body:
Hey Smite,

Unfortunately, the OCS team and player list isn't available yet.

We've invited the teams that participated in the most recent OCS to join the league in 2016, and we'll be finalising the lineup soon. The OCS starts in February, so you can expect an announcement in the coming weeks!

Marowi

Legacy, Chiefs, and Sin all have challenger teams playing in the OCS (Legacy Genesis, Sin Academy, Chiefs Black) and Abyss (apparently) have two teams (Red, White). I think the other 3 teams will either be OPL teams who have a challenger team or some of last years OCS teams that didn't qualify for OPL.

The teams haven't officially been confirmed but this is what I've heard. Riot may have plans to include/exclude teams for all I know.
